item.title: Fine-Tuning Small Language Models for Domain-Specific AI: An Edge AI Perspective
item.description: Shakti SLMs: Fine-tuning compact language models for efficient, domain-specific AI on edge devices.

item.title: Samba-asr state-of-the-art speech recognition leveraging structured state-space models
item.description: Samba-ASR, a novel speech recognition model using Mamba architecture, surpasses existing transformer models in accuracy and efficiency, setting a new benchmark for future ASR research.
